dict.string: As soon as you modify settings (change one of the permanent settings), Browser Exam and Config Key are recalculated using all the settings this version of SEB supports. You then have to share these settings as a config file if you want to use it with other versions of SEB, which also use the Browser Exam or Config Key to verify settings for an exam.
Config was modified, keys won't match original state!

The Browser Exam Key (BEK) depends on SEB's code signature and the current SEB config. Copy the value to the according field in the quiz settings of a compatible exam system. SEB on each platform generates another BEK, even if the same SEB config is used. Different versions of SEB for iOS generate the same BEK, as long as the same SEB config file is used.

The Config Key (CK) depends on the current SEB config. It can be generated automatically by a compatible exam server together with the SEB config to be used for an exam. All SEB versions supporting the CK will generate the same CK as long as the same, unmodified SEB config file is used.

Select the key(s) which you want to be shared (using the Share button in the root Settings view) and copied to the clipboard after closing Settings. Usually only the Browser Exam Key needs to be copied manually to the according field in the quiz settings of a compatible exam system.

The Browser Exam and/or Config Key of the current SEB config can be shared (as text strings) together with the exported, modified config file or alone, if the opened config isn't supposed to be modified. The keys are also copied into the clipboard when closing Settings (so an exam admin can easily paste them to the according quiz settings).
